content: Hello! Welcome to my website. I'm Theo, and I'm here to help you with any questions you may have or information you might need. Feel free to ask!

I'm Theodoros Gkisis, known as Theo. I'm a Cloud Engineer based in Thessaloniki, Greece, with over three years of experience in designing and optimizing cloud infrastructures. My background is in Electrical and Computer Engineering, which complements my practical cloud expertise nicely. If you have any questions about my work or experience, feel free to ask!
